title: Para Type
content:
[http://www.creativepro.com/story/feature/23282.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010113647/http:/www.creativepro.com/story/feature/23282.html "http://www.creativepro.com/story/feature/23282.html")

Nice John D. Berry article about [ParaType](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010113647/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ParaType), mostly about their [Cyrillic](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010113647/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cyrillic) faces and their catalog.

author: Dan Weaver
